attributes.action: Farms where badgers are killed should be stripped of organic status
attributes.additional_details:
I urge the government and the Soil Association to strip farms taking part in the badger cull of their organic status.
Many people who buy organic do so with an expectation of higher animal welfare standards and I believe the Soil Association's holistic ethos and organic principles are at odds with this cull.

I also believe the British public has a right to make informed purchasing decisions around this issue.
